title: ENVE Aero Stem Redesign
carddescription: Due to full aero cockpits attaching aerobars to road bikes, attaching clip-on aerobars has become more difficult. This project aims to solve that problem for one specific stem design.

features.title: Redesigned Faceplate for Aerobar Compatibility
features.text: Reimagines the ENVE Aero Stem faceplate to support standard 30mm clip-on aerobars like the Zipp Vuka Clip. Avoids needing to replace the entire cockpit.

features.title: Stress-Optimized Design
features.text: Performed Finite Element Analysis (FEA) to evaluate stress distribution and ensure safety margins well below aluminum yield strength.

features.title: Iterative Mesh Refinement
features.text: Used mesh refinement with over 736,000 degrees of freedom to ensure accurate stress analysis while keeping simulation time reasonable.
